revised_title: Mössbauer Studies of Luna 16 and 20 Lunar Soils: Iron Distribution in Lunar Soils
tldr: This study uses Mössbauer spectroscopy to analyze samples of lunar soils collected by Luna 16 and 20 missions. The research determines the distribution of iron in various mineral phases and provides insights into the composition of lunar soils. The findings reveal differences in the iron distribution and mineral content between the two samples, offering valuable information for understanding the geological history of the Moon.
